channel.title: New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod" - Remember Your Past (Special Mission)

item.title: Re: New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod
item.content:encoded: hello hows every one just wonted to say hi.

item.title: Re: New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod
item.content:encoded: You're right, it says what bloodline you want to be when you do the looping mission (Into the Loop), Remember Your Past is available only in Season 1! ;D

item.title: Re: New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod
item.content:encoded: you don't see it when you loop because you choose your bloodline at the beginning

item.title: Re: New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod
item.content:encoded: Or if you loop you'll see it again! :P

item.title: Re: New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod
item.content:encoded: Well if you make another charcter, u'll get this mission tho ^.^

item.title: Re: New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod
item.content:encoded: cool, I'll never see that mission though. lol

item.title: New Bloodline Get Special Mission Meathod
item.content:encoded:
It's like this When u reach "Level 9 (Season1 Only)"

Remember Your Past
You remember your days as a young, impressionable Ninja..
Activate Your Bloodline >

Choose your Bloodline!

As you completed your latest mission, you flash back to a time long ago -
when you were just a young, impressionable Ninja kid, and you made a
choice that defines your existence..

Ο RedEye (you poked yourself in the eye, and it bled all over - lets you learn Jutsu used
on you in missions - also, you can learn bloodline-specific jutsu, and get more experience per
mission)

Ο WhiteEye (you got something nasty in your eye, and it stayed that way - lets you analyze
your surroundings fully, and doubles your chances for finding rare items and ninjas - also, you
can learn bloodline-specific jutsu, and are more adept at day-to-day missions)

Ο Legacy of the Hero (You read the Legends of the Flash, and loved them so much
you got a wicked eyepatch, just like he wore - 50% more Chakra than other Ninja, and allows
you to recruit specific high-level Ninja and Summons that only Billy can get, and receive more
stamina per day)

Choose Bloodline

If you Choose Red Eye.

You recall your past, and your Bloodline Abilities flow into you..
You got the Bloodline RedEye!

If you Choose WhiteEye.

You recall your past, and your Bloodline Abilities flow into you..
You got the Bloodline WhiteEye!

If you Choose Legacy of the Hero.

You recall your past, and your Bloodline Abilities flow into you..
You got the Bloodline Legacy of the Hero!

Note: The Underlined words are supose to be like the Links on the BvS Mission thing
and the "Ο" is supose to represent Select Option Circles
